thread.title: Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore receives Hotel Security Excellence Award 2015
thread.title_full: Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore receives Hotel Security Excellence Award 2015

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore receives Hotel Security Excellence Award 2015
text:
Click here for information and nomination Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore receives Hotel Security Excellence Award 2015 
SINGAPORE â€“ Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore is a proud recipient of Hotel Security Excellence Award at the Annual Hotel Security Award in 2015 in conjunction with the Annual Security Conference 2015. This award ceremony is organized by Singapore Hotel Association (SHA), held in collaboration with the National Crime Prevention Council (NCP) and Singapore Police Force (SPF). The event is graced by Guest-of-Honor, Mr Amrin Amin, Parliamentary Secretary and Ministry of Home Affairs. 
Hotel Security Excellence Award is the highest category amongst all awards and to qualify, hotel has to undergo a stringent audit process which includes inspection of physical security, contingency and crisis plans, and training procedures. Hotel Jen Orchardgateway Singapore
